title: Gulkand: Sweet, Cooling, and Good for Your Skin
author: Harish
excerpt: Gulkand is more than a sweet preserve—it's an Ayurvedic cooling tonic loved for digestion, skin health, and emotional balance.
content:
What Makes Gulkand Special?

Gulkand is a traditional preserve made from fragrant rose petals and natural sweeteners. It is cooling, soothing, and deeply rejuvenating—especially for Pitta types experiencing heat, acidity, or irritability.

Health Benefits

  • Reduces internal heat and acidity.
  • Promotes gentle digestion.
  • Supports skin clarity and glow.
  • Calms emotional irritability.

How to Use Gulkand

  • 1 tsp with milk at night for cooling sleep.
  • As a sweet topping for desserts.
  • Mixed into yogurt for a cooling snack.

Traditional Recipes

Ayurvedic homes often sun-cook rose petals and jaggery for days to intensify flavor and potency. Cardamom adds digestion-boosting warmth.

Shop Gulkand for a sweet, cooling Ayurvedic treat.
